SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Article
Represents an article within a topic
ArticleManager
This class is responsible for comparing articles statistics.
ArticleScraper
This class is responsible for downloading the text content of an article from a URL It uses the JSoup library to fetch and parse the HTML
ArticleWithScore
ArticleWithScore is a wrapper class that represents an article with a score.
ArticleWord
Represents a word in an article
Directories
 
Files
 
Interactions
Interactions handles all user interaction with the program.
LexiconWord
Represents a word with a lexicon ranking, found in Lexicon.txt
Logging
This class is responsible for logging messages in a specific format It contains some enumerated values for the log levels
Main
 
SentimentManager
This class is responsible for ranking the sentiment of an article based on a lexicon of words with associated sentiment values.
Sorting
This class contains miscellaneous sorting methods
Strings
This class contains misc methods for manipulating strings
Topic
This class represents a topic, which is comprised of articles This contains a method which parses the directory related to the topic and then reads the articles in the directory
Util
 
WordManager
This class is responsible for doing operations / calculating statistics with the words in an article
